Entries.Location_Entry: Welcome! Are you here to browse or are you just admiring the best new shopkeeper in the valley?$10 That's me, by the way!$1
Entries.GreenRain: Whoa! What is happening?!$3 The sky is... green! This is so weird and exciting!$10 I need to take notes, this could be a huge tourist draw!$1
Entries.GreenRain_2: It's another Green Rain!$1 I've got my data-gathering kit all ready this time. Think of the unique, mossy products we could market!$10
Entries.DumpsterDiveComment: Hey! What are you doing in that trash can?!$3 If you're that hard up for cash, I've got plenty of work that needs doing.$5 Honestly, have some self-respect.$8
Entries.HitBySlingshot: OW!$3 Did you just shoot something at me?!$5 Watch where you're pointing that thing, butterfingers!$8
Entries.Resort: This place is incredible!$10 The amenities, the coordinated staff uniforms, the sheer volume of customers! I'm taking SO many notes for the Oasis!$1
Entries.Resort_Bar: A drink in the sun? Yes please!$1 This is the life! I feel a new sales strategy bubbling up!$10
Entries.Resort_Chair: Don't mind me, just soaking up the sun and doing some market research.$9 Ahh, perfection.$1
Entries.Resort_Dance: Woo! I love this music!$10 It really gets the blood pumping!$1
Entries.Resort_Entering: I've arrived!$10 Time to see what all the fuss is about. I bet our desert hospitality is warmer, though.$1
Entries.Resort_Leaving: Aww, time to go already?$2 I got so many good ideas today! I feel energized and ready for business!$1
Entries.Resort_Shore: The ocean is huge!$3 It's a little intimidating compared to a nice, predictable oasis, but the sound is nice.$6
Entries.Resort_Towel: Gotta make sure I don't get sand everywhere.$0 It's a professional hazard.$1
Entries.Resort_Umbrella: This shade is nice, but I live in a desert, I can take the heat!$1 The sun gives me energy!$10
Entries.Resort_Wander: So much to see, so many business practices to analyze!$10 This is better than any seminar!$1
Entries.SpouseFarmhouseClutter: My ember, I nearly tripped on this on my way to the kitchen!$3 Let's clear a path, okay? Safety first, profits second!$0
Entries.SpouseGiftJealous: Oh, for them?$6 That's... nice of you to think of them.$7 I'm sure they'll appreciate it.$8
Entries.Spouse_MonstersInHouse: A monster! In our house!$3 My sandsong, get behind me! I'll... uh... distract it with a dazzling sales pitch!$5
Entries.SpouseStardrop: My glow... is this for me?$2 It tastes like a thousand desert sunrises combined into one.$9 Thank you... for everything you are.$4
Entries.breakUp: A... wilted bouquet?$3 What does this mean? Are you... breaking up with me?$2 I... I think I need to be alone right now.$7
Entries.divorced: Oh. It's you.$8 I'm extremely busy with inventory today, so if you'll excuse me.$6
Entries.WipedMemory: Hey there! You look like you've got some pep in your step!$10 I'm Djinn! I've got big plans for this valley, you just wait and see!$1
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)226: Spicy Eel! Yes!$10 The perfect fuel for a long day of making sales! You're the best!$4
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)82: A Fire Quartz!$10 It's like holding a tiny, personal sun. It's beautiful, thank you!$9
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)279: Magic Rock Candy?! Are you serious?!$3 This is amazing! Thank you so much, this is the best!$10
Entries.AcceptGift_Loved: WOW! This is absolutely fantastic!$10 You really know the way to a girl's heart! Thank you!$4
Entries.AcceptGift_Liked: Ooh, for me? This is great!$1 I really like it, thank you for thinking of me.$4
Entries.AcceptGift_Neutral: Oh, thanks.$0 I can find a use for this, I'm sure.$6
Entries.AcceptGift_Disliked: Um... thanks?$6 I'm not really a fan of this kind of thing, but... it's the thought that counts, I guess.$7
Entries.AcceptGift_Hated: Ugh, what IS this?$5 Get it away from me! Do I look like someone who wants... this?!$8
Entries.AcceptBirthdayGift_Loved: For my birthday?! And it's my favorite!$3 This is the best birthday I've ever had! Thank you, thank you, thank you!$9
Entries.AcceptBirthdayGift_Liked: A birthday gift! You remembered!$4 This is so thoughtful, thank you so much, @. It really means a lot.$9
Entries.AcceptBirthdayGift_Neutral: Oh, a gift for my birthday.$0 Thanks for remembering.$6
Entries.AcceptBirthdayGift_Disliked: It's my birthday... and you got me this?$7 Oh. Well... thanks, I guess.$2
Entries.AcceptBirthdayGift_Hated: Are you kidding me?!$5 On my BIRTHDAY of all days?! Just... go.$8
Entries.AcceptBouquet: For... me?$4 After everything you've helped me with... I... Yes! Of course, yes!$9 I was really hoping you felt the same way!$10
Entries.MovieInvitation: A movie?! Heck yeah, I'm in!$10 I could use a break from staring at sales figures. Just tell me when and where!$1
Entries.RejectMovieTicket_DontWantToSeeThatMovie: A horror movie? No way!$5 I deal with enough stress at work, I don't need to be scared for fun!$8
Entries.RejectMovieTicket_AlreadyWatchedThisWeek: Whoa there, eager beaver!$1 I already saw a movie this week. My brain needs time to process all that cinematic data!$0
Entries.RejectMovieTicket_AlreadyInvitedBySomeon: Aw, sorry!$2 Someone else already invited me. Maybe next time!$0
Entries.RejectMovieTicket_Divorced: Going to the movies with you?$8 I think I'd rather count grains of sand. Individually.$5
Entries.RejectItem_(O)168: Is this a joke?$5 Don't give me your trash. I'm not a garbage can.$8
Entries.RejectGift_Divorced: I don't want anything from you.$8
Entries.RejectBouquet_LowHearts: Whoa there!$3 I like your enthusiasm, but I think we should get to know each other better first. Let's not rush things!$0
Entries.RejectBouquet_Divorced: You must be joking.$5 After everything that happened? The answer is no. Now, please leave.$8
Entries.RejectMermaidPendant_Under10Hearts: Oh! @, I... I'm flattered, I really am.$4 But... I'm not ready for that yet.#$b#$7There's still so much going on. I'm sorry.$7
Entries.RejectMermaidPendant_NeedHouseUpgrade: I'd love to, but... where would I live?$3 Your place is a little small for two... let alone for someone with as much energy as me!$0
Entries.RejectMermaidPendant_Divorced: You have the audacity to offer me that?$5 After what you did?$8 Get out of my sight.$8
Entries.Fair_Judging: Ooh, the judging! This is the most exciting part!$10 Let's see whose display has the best market appeal!$1
Entries.Fair_Judged_PlayerWon: You won first place! YES!$10 I knew you could do it! Your grange display was a masterpiece of presentation and product selection!$1
Entries.Fair_Judged_PlayerLost: Aw, tough break.$2 But hey, your display still had a lot of potential! We'll workshop some new strategies for next year!$0
Entries.FlowerDance_Accept: Dance with me? I thought you'd never ask!$4 Let's go show everyone how it's done!$10
Entries.FlowerDance_Decline: Oh! Uh, sorry.$2 I'm... not really in the mood for dancing right now. I've got a lot on my mind.$7
Entries.WinterStar_GiveGift_Before_Spouse: Happy Winter Star, my ember!$4 I was so excited to give you this. I really hope you love it!$9
Entries.WinterStar_GiveGift_Before: Happy Winter Star!$1 I saw this and immediately thought of you. I hope you like it!$4
Entries.WinterStar_GiveGift_After_Spouse: I'm so glad you like it!$9 Seeing you this happy is the only gift I'll ever need.$4
Entries.WinterStar_GiveGift_After: You like it! Great!$10 I have a knack for picking out the perfect thing, don't I?$1
Entries.Oasis: Welcome to the Calico Desert's number one tourist destination!$10 How can I help you today? Looking for seeds? Artifacts? Unbeatable deals?$1
Entries.SeedShop_Tue: Pierre's has a decent setup, but I see so much wasted potential.$6 He could easily triple his profits with a few of my marketing strategies.$0
Entries.spring_Mon: Monday! A fresh start to the week!$10 So many opportunities for success! What's your big plan for the day?$1
Entries.summer_1: Happy Summer!$10 The heat is on, which means it's peak tourist season! I'm absolutely buzzing with energy!$1
Entries.fall_2: The air is getting so crisp!$1 I'm thinking of a new marketing angle... 'Cozy Autumn Deals at the Oasis!' What do you think?$0
Entries.winter_3: Brrr! It's colder than a frozen tear out here!$3 Good thing business inside is always hot, hot, hot!$1
Entries.Tue4: Hey, @!$1 It's good to see a friendly face. I've been staring at shipping manifests all morning.$6
Entries.Fri8: It's Friday!$10 You know what that means? Time to project our weekend sales figures!$1 It's great seeing you, @.$4

Entries.Djinn: This is so exciting!$10#$b#I bet that Vincent's going to be the winner this year!$1
Look at all the flowers! And the dresses!$4#$b#This festival has so much energy, I love it!$10
A party on the beach? In the middle of summer? YES PLEASE!$10#$b#This is my kind of festival! The heat feels just like home.$9
Wow... they're like little floating stars in the water.$10#$b#It's so beautiful it makes me want to cry happy tears! It's just... magical.$9
There's so much to see and do! Where do we even start?!$10#$b#I already tried the slingshot game three times. I'm getting better!$1
Ooh, a haunted maze! This looks like so much fun!$10#$b#Don't worry, if you get scared just stick close to me. I'm not afraid of anything!$1
Brrr! It's freezing out here!$5#$b#But I'm not letting a little cold stop me from winning that fishing competition! I've been practicing!$1
Happy Winter Star! I've been looking forward to this all year!$10#$b#Giving gifts is the best part. Seeing everyone's happy faces makes me feel all warm inside!$4

Entries.Djinn0: I still can't believe we're engaged!$4 I've been running some... uh... sales projections for the wedding.$1 It's going to be the event of the century!$10
Entries.Djinn1: Every time I look down at my hand, I just get this big, goofy grin on my face.$9 I can't wait to marry you, @.$4

Entries.spring_14: This farm is really thriving, my glow.$1 All your hard work is paying off. It's really inspiring to watch.$9
Entries.summer_28: Tonight's the Dance of the Moonlight Jellies!$10 I can't wait to watch them with you. It's so much more magical than watching them alone.$4
Entries.fall_1: Happy first day of Fall, my sandsong!$1 How about some spicy eel to celebrate the new season? My treat!$4
Entries.winter_17: It's so cold outside, but it's so warm in here with you.$9 I'm glad this is our home.$4
Entries.patio_Djinn: Just taking a little break and getting some sun.$9 It's nice to have a quiet moment with you, my ember.$4
Entries.Rainy_Day_0: The sound of the rain is nice... but I'm glad I'm in here with you.$4 It's a perfect day to stay in and... reorganize the pantry by expiration date!$1
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: I've already finished all my chores for the day.$1 That means more time to spend with my favorite farmer.$4
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: Mmm, I love the smell of rain on the soil.$9 It's so different from the desert. It smells like life.$1
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: This weather makes me want to just curl up with a good book.$6 ...A good book on advanced sales tactics, of course!$1
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: I left a little something for you in the kitchen, my ember.$1 Think of it as a thank you for being so wonderful.$4
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: Being a homebody with you is my new favorite hobby.$9 Don't tell Sandy, she'll think I've gone soft!$1
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Just looking around at this amazing life we've built.$9 All my worries about fitting in... they just seem to melt away when I'm with you.$4
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: I was thinking we could expand the farm next season.$1 I've already drafted a five-step plan to maximize profits and cuteness! It involves more ducks.$10
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: Sometimes I just stop and watch you work.$6 You're so dedicated. It makes me want to work even harder, too!$1
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: Our home is my favorite place in the whole world.$9 Because you're here, my sandsong.$4
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: The storm sounds intense tonight.$3 Good thing we're safe and warm in here together.$9
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: Let the rain wash away all the worries of the day.$6 Tomorrow is a new beginning, my glow.$0
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: I feel like I could take on the world, as long as I have you to come home to.$9
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: Want to share some spicy eel and watch the lightning? It's kind of romantic, don't you think?$4
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: This kind of night makes me want to tell you all my secrets.$6 But you already know them all, don't you?$4
Entries.Rainy_Night_5: I used to be scared of storms when I was little.$7 But I'm not scared of anything when I'm with you.$9
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: The farm is so peaceful at night.$6 I used to think I needed constant noise and excitement... but being here with you is all I need.$9
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: Have you eaten dinner, my ember?$0 I can whip something up! My pepper poppers are almost famous in the Calico Desert!$1
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: Another successful day down.$1 Time to rest up and get ready to do it all again tomorrow!$0
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: Come sit with me for a while.$4 The chores can wait. I just want to be with my husband/wife.$9
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: I love you, my glow.$9 Just wanted to make sure you knew that.$4
Entries.Indoor_Night_5: I'm so proud of everything you've accomplished.$1 You've turned this place into something truly special.$9
Entries.funReturn_Djinn: I'm back!$10 I was visiting Sandy at the Oasis. She says hi!#$b#$1 It's a great shop, but it's not home.$9 Home is wherever you are, my sandsong.$4
Entries.spring_Djinn: The flowers blooming on the farm are so beautiful.$1 It gives me an idea for a new potpourri to sell at the shop! What do you think, a 'Pelican Town Spring' scent?$10
Entries.summer_Djinn: Whew, it's a hot one!$1 Reminds me of home. Let's make sure we both stay hydrated today, my ember.$4
Entries.fall_Djinn: My favorite part of fall is the colors.$9 It's like the whole world is a warm fire. Just like my love for you!$4 ...Was that cheesy? It felt cheesy.$1
Entries.winter_Djinn: It's cold, but our home is so warm and full of love.$9 I wouldn't trade it for all the gold in the desert.$4
Entries.Outdoor_Djinn: The farm air is so fresh!$10 Makes me want to run a few laps! It's all about productivity and personal health!$1
Entries.Outdoor_0: Ah, feels good to be outside.$1 A change of scenery is always good for business... and for the soul!$9
Entries.Outdoor_1: All this green is still a bit of a shock compared to the endless sand, but I'm getting used to it.$1 It's beautiful.$9
Entries.Outdoor_2: Checking on the animals.$0 They're our most valuable, non-crop assets! And they're cute, too.$1
Entries.Outdoor_3: This open space is amazing.$10 You can really think out here. No wonder you get so much done!$1
Entries.Outdoor_4: Looking at all the crops you've planted... it's amazing.$1 Your hard work is written all over this land.$9
Entries.Outdoor_5: Just enjoying the sun!$10 It feels almost as good as the desert sun.$1
Entries.spouseRoom_Djinn: This is my little corner of the world.$1 I've got my sales charts, my marketing plans... and a picture of you, of course.$4 It helps me stay focused on what's really important.$9
Entries.OneKid_0: Whew! Keeping up with %kid1 is a full-time job!$3 So much energy! I think they get it from me.$10
Entries.OneKid_1: I was telling %kid1 a story about the desert last night.$1 Their eyes were so wide! Maybe they'll be a little adventurer.$10
Entries.OneKid_2: Do you think we're doing a good job?$7 This whole parenting thing is harder than negotiating with a shipping company.$2 But... it's much more rewarding.$9
Entries.OneKid_3: I caught %kid1 trying to 'sell' their toys to the cat.$1 A future business prodigy, I'm telling you!$10
Entries.OneKid_4: Our little family is the best venture I've ever been a part of.$9 Thank you for building it with me, my glow.$4
Entries.TwoKids_0: %kid1 was helping %kid2 'organize' the toy chest today.$1 It looked like a cyclone hit it, but they were having so much fun!$9
Entries.TwoKids_1: It's amazing how different %kid1 and %kid2 are.$0 It's like managing two very different, very cute employees.$1
Entries.TwoKids_2: Our house is so full of noise and laughter now.$10 I love it. I wouldn't have it any other way.$9
Entries.TwoKids_3: I took the kids to see Sandy today.$1 She absolutely adores them. She kept calling them her little 'Sand Sprites'.$10
Entries.TwoKids_4: I promise I'll always work my hardest to provide for this family, my sandsong.$9 You and the kids are my world.$4
Entries.Good_0: I woke up with so much energy today!$10 I've already watered the crops, fed the animals, and drafted a three-point plan to increase our farm's quarterly earnings!$1 You're the best partner a Djinn could ask for, my ember!$4
Entries.Good_1: I made you a Triple Shot Espresso!$1 Go get 'em today, my glow! Seize the day and all that!$10
Entries.Good_2: I feel like I'm glowing today!$10 Must be your love. It's better than any cup of coffee!$4
Entries.Good_3: I feel invincible today!$1 Let's go out and make this the best, most profitable day ever!$10
Entries.Good_4: I reorganized all the chests this morning.$1 Now our workflow will be 15% more efficient! It's the little things that make a big difference!$10
Entries.Good_5: Everything is just... perfect.$9 Our farm, our family... you. I couldn't be happier.$4
Entries.Good_6: What a beautiful day!$10 Makes me want to run a special promotion! 'Buy one hug, get one kiss free!' Limited time offer for my favorite customer.$4
Entries.Good_7: I have so many amazing ideas today!$1 Our farm is going to be the most successful operation this side of the Gem Sea!$10
Entries.Good_8: Seeing you always puts a smile on my face.$4 No matter what kind of day I'm having.$9
Entries.Good_9: I love you so much!$10 Just wanted to say it again! I'll probably say it again in five minutes!$4
Entries.Neutral_0: Morning, my sandsong.$0 Did you sleep well? I was up a little late looking over some seed catalogues.$6
Entries.Neutral_1: Just another day on the farm.$0 Got a lot to do today. Let's get to it.$6
Entries.Neutral_2: Don't forget to eat breakfast, okay?$0 You need energy to get through the day.$6
Entries.Neutral_3: I'll handle some of the farm chores today, don't you worry.$0 We're a team, after all.$1
Entries.Neutral_4: I was just thinking about what to make for dinner.$0 Do you have any preferences?$6
Entries.Neutral_5: I wonder how Sandy and Emily are doing today.$0 I should probably send them a letter soon.$6
Entries.Neutral_6: The quiet life is... nice.$0 It's very different from what I'm used to, but it's a good kind of different.$6
Entries.Neutral_7: Just taking a moment to breathe.$0 It's easy to get caught up in the hustle and bustle, even here.$6
Entries.Neutral_8: Remember to take a break later, my glow.$0 Overworking leads to diminishing returns.$0
Entries.Neutral_9: Hm? Oh, sorry, I was a million miles away.$6 Just crunching some numbers in my head.$0
Entries.Bad_0: Ugh.$8 I had a nightmare that all our starfruit went bad right before we could ship it.$2 It just... felt a little too real, you know?$7
Entries.Bad_1: I'm just feeling a little insecure today, my sandsong.$7 Sometimes I still worry that I'm not pulling my weight around here... that you do everything.$2
Entries.Bad_2: I'm not feeling my usual peppy self today.$2 Maybe I just need a hug.$7
Entries.Bad_3: I got a letter from my old boss.$6 It wasn't mean or anything, but... it just brought back a lot of stressful memories.$7
Entries.Bad_4: I feel like a fraud sometimes.$7 All this energy... sometimes it's just a mask. Thanks for always seeing the real me, my glow.$2
Entries.Bad_5: I feel so tired today.$7 I don't really feel like talking, if that's okay.$2
Entries.Bad_6: Do you ever think about the desert?$7 I miss the dry heat sometimes. The way the sand sparkles at sunset.$2
Entries.Bad_7: I had that awful court case on my mind when I woke up.$7 I know it's over, but... it's hard to forget people hating you for what you are.$2
Entries.Bad_8: Sorry if I seem a little quiet.$7 I just don't have the energy to be 'on' today.$2
Entries.Bad_9: Is it okay if I'm not bubbly and loud today?$7 I still love you just as much. I'm just... feeling a little small.$2

Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Djinn: Looking out at the valley like this... it's amazing.$0#$b#For so long, I was scared of people finding out what I was. I thought they'd see my work as just... cheap magic.$7#$b#But you never did. You saw me. Just me.$2#$b#Being with you, my ember, gave me the confidence to be my true self. Thank you for giving me a home where I can truly shine.$4

Entries.Djinn_AfterWedding: We did it! We're actually married!$10 I promise to be the most exciting, supportive, and... passionate wife ever!$4 My ember, our future together is going to be dazzling!$9
Entries.Djinn_Engaged: I... I don't even know what to say!$3 Is this really happening?! YES! A thousand times, yes!$9 I'm going to be the happiest Djinn in the entire world!$4

Entries.Djinn_love_movie_BeforeMovie: Ooh! I've been wanting to see this one! I have a feeling it's gonna be great!$10
Entries.Djinn_love_movie_DuringMovie: YES! That was AWESOME! This is the best movie ever!$3
Entries.Djinn_love_movie_AfterMovie: That was incredible! Action, laughs, everything!$10#$b#We should totally see it again sometime!$1
Entries.Djinn_like_movie_BeforeMovie: This looks like it could be fun. Let's get some snacks!$1
Entries.Djinn_like_movie_AfterMovie: I liked that! It was a nice way to spend the evening.$0#$b#Thanks for inviting me, @.$4
Entries.Djinn_dislike_movie_BeforeMovie: Hmm. Are you sure about this one?$6#$b#Well, okay. I'll give it a shot.$0
Entries.Djinn_dislike_movie_DuringMovie: Is it... over yet? I think I need a triple shot espresso to stay awake.$7
Entries.Djinn_dislike_movie_AfterMovie: Well... that was certainly a movie.$6#$b#Let's... maybe see something with a little more pizzazz next time?$0

Changes..LogName: Edit FRIEND_1 dialogue for the Djinn
